content: I like the sound of that brick workout. I think I'll try to fit it in on Wednesdays, which is usually my rest day from running. Speaking of running, I've been trying to get in at least 3 runs per week, and I've been doing a lot of shorter runs around the local park on Sundays after my bike rides. Do you have any tips on how to structure my run training to prepare for the sprint triathlon?
